name: adventurelog
description: AdventureLog is a web-based adventure journaling app where users can track their travels, add stories, locations and timelines. It supports rich posts with media and is ideal for self-hosted digital travel diaries and adventure logs.
features: Digital Travel Diary: Comprehensive logs for documenting every adventure and journey. Preserve your memories forever.
Rich Storytelling: Combine stories, locations, and timelines in detailed entries. Tell your travel story completely.
Media Support: Attach photos, videos, and files to enhance your memories. Bring your adventures to life.
Interactive Maps: Visualize all your journeys on dynamic maps. See where you've been at a glance.
Self-Hosted Privacy: Keep travel memories on your own server infrastructure. Complete privacy guaranteed.
Smart Organization: Tags and categories make finding past adventures effortless. Never lose a memory.
Data Control: Your personal travel data stays completely under your ownership. No third-party access.
Intuitive Interface: Easy-to-use web design for browsing and reliving experiences. Navigate your adventures smoothly.
